queries.query: SELECT "TABLE-macaddtblcount//dyn_cnt" AS "Dynamic MAC Count" FROM "mdt_realtime"."autogen"."show mac address-table count" WHERE time > :dashboardTime: AND "Producer"=:device:

queryConfig.rawText: SELECT "TABLE-macaddtblcount//dyn_cnt" AS "Dynamic MAC Count" FROM "mdt_realtime"."autogen"."show mac address-table count" WHERE time > :dashboardTime: AND "Producer"=:device:

queries.query: SELECT sum("Multicast traffic") AS "Global Multicast traffic" FROM (SELECT NON_NEGATIVE_DERIVATIVE(mean("eth_inmcast"), 1s) AS "Multicast traffic" FROM "mdt_realtime"."autogen"."show interface ethernet1/1-52/TABLE_interface" WHERE time > :dashboardTime: AND "Producer"=:device: GROUP BY time(20s), "TABLE_interface" FILL(none)) GROUP BY time(5s) FILL(linear)

queryConfig.rawText: SELECT sum("Multicast traffic") AS "Global Multicast traffic" FROM (SELECT NON_NEGATIVE_DERIVATIVE(mean("eth_inmcast"), 1s) AS "Multicast traffic" FROM "mdt_realtime"."autogen"."show interface ethernet1/1-52/TABLE_interface" WHERE time > :dashboardTime: AND "Producer"=:device: GROUP BY time(20s), "TABLE_interface" FILL(none)) GROUP BY time(5s) FILL(linear)

queries.query: SELECT sum("Unicast traffic") AS "Global Unicast traffic" FROM (SELECT NON_NEGATIVE_DERIVATIVE(mean("eth_inucast"), 1s) AS "Unicast traffic" FROM "mdt_realtime"."autogen"."show interface ethernet1/1-52/TABLE_interface" WHERE time > :dashboardTime: AND "Producer"=:device: GROUP BY time(20s), "TABLE_interface" FILL(none)) GROUP BY time(5s) FILL(linear)

queryConfig.rawText: SELECT sum("Unicast traffic") AS "Global Unicast traffic" FROM (SELECT NON_NEGATIVE_DERIVATIVE(mean("eth_inucast"), 1s) AS "Unicast traffic" FROM "mdt_realtime"."autogen"."show interface ethernet1/1-52/TABLE_interface" WHERE time > :dashboardTime: AND "Producer"=:device: GROUP BY time(20s), "TABLE_interface" FILL(none)) GROUP BY time(5s) FILL(linear)

queries.query: SELECT count("State") FROM (SELECT last("adj-state-out") AS "State" FROM "mdt_realtime"."autogen"."show isis adjacency/TABLE_process_adj" WHERE time > :dashboardTime: AND "adj-state-out"='UP' AND "Producer"=:device: GROUP BY "TABLE_process_adj") GROUP BY time(:interval:) FILL(none)

queryConfig.rawText: SELECT count("State") FROM (SELECT last("adj-state-out") AS "State" FROM "mdt_realtime"."autogen"."show isis adjacency/TABLE_process_adj" WHERE time > :dashboardTime: AND "adj-state-out"='UP' AND "Producer"=:device: GROUP BY "TABLE_process_adj") GROUP BY time(:interval:) FILL(none)

queries.query: SELECT count("VNI") FROM (SELECT last("vni") AS "VNI", last("state") AS "State" FROM "mdt_realtime"."autogen"."sys/eps/epId-1/nws/nvoNws//nvoOperNw" WHERE time > :dashboardTime: AND "Producer"=:device: AND "state"='Up' GROUP BY "nvoNws//nvoOperNw") GROUP BY time(:interval:) FILL(none)

queryConfig.rawText: SELECT count("VNI") FROM (SELECT last("vni") AS "VNI", last("state") AS "State" FROM "mdt_realtime"."autogen"."sys/eps/epId-1/nws/nvoNws//nvoOperNw" WHERE time > :dashboardTime: AND "Producer"=:device: AND "state"='Up' GROUP BY "nvoNws//nvoOperNw") GROUP BY time(:interval:) FILL(none)

queries.query: SELECT count("ID") FROM (SELECT last("id") AS "ID" FROM "mdt_realtime"."autogen"."sys/bd/bdEntity//l2BD" WHERE "id" != 1 AND time > :dashboardTime: AND "Producer"=:device: GROUP BY "bdEntity//l2BD") GROUP BY time(:interval:) FILL(none)

queryConfig.rawText: SELECT count("ID") FROM (SELECT last("id") AS "ID" FROM "mdt_realtime"."autogen"."sys/bd/bdEntity//l2BD" WHERE "id" != 1 AND time > :dashboardTime: AND "Producer"=:device: GROUP BY "bdEntity//l2BD") GROUP BY time(:interval:) FILL(none)

query.influxql: SHOW TAG VALUES ON :database: FROM :measurement: WITH KEY=:tagKey:
